Package pizzapizza

Class SpecialtyController

java.lang.Object
pizzapizza.SpecialtyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SpecialtyController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The `SpecialtyController` class is a controller for the specialty pizza selection in the Pizza Pizza application. It implements the Initializable interface to initialize the controller when the FXML file is loaded.
Author:
Sibi suriyanarayan Tiruchirapalli venketaramani, Rahulraj Rajesh

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
